zh-Hant.title: 語法對照檢查
zh-Hant.prompt: Could you please help me to ensure that the grammar and spelling are correct? Do not tryto improve the text, if no mistake is found, tellme that this paragraph is good.lf you find grammar or spelling mistakes, please list the mistakes you find in a two-column markdown table, put the original text in the first column.put the corrected text in the second columnand do highlight the key words you fixed in bold. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese.
zh-Hant.description: 你能幫我確保語法和拼寫的正確性嗎？如果你發現語法或拼寫錯誤，請將你發現的錯誤列在一個兩欄的標記表中，將原文放在第一欄，將更正後的文本放在第二欄，並將你修正的關鍵詞用黑體字標出。

metaDescription: 文本錯誤？識別語法與拼寫錯誤但不改變文風。獲取清晰的修改對比表！立即嘗試！
